r.t:
Any cell can be blank, a value, a list of comma separated values, a range from::to, or an expression with sql wildcards (%=match any,_=match char,[ab]=match chars in list) or comma-separated list.
NOTE: If dates are are all blank, just uses the green and orange tables and ignores others.
Enter date range proposals were received by NSF. Tip: Use narrow date ranges for faster queries.
Enter date range proposals were DD Concurred. Use narrow date ranges for faster queries.
Include the NSF or PD that is part of the id for solicitations or program descriptions. Google can help you find ids.
8-digit org code, but you can use wildcards to restrict to directorate (05% for CISE) or divisions (050[125]% is CCF, IIS, & CNS)
Can restrict proposals by division abbreviation instead of numeric org code.

20 possibilities PEND: all types of pending DECL: decline concurred by DD AWD, RCOM, CLO: awarded, recommended, or closed WTH, RTNR: all types of withdrawn/return without review ENC,INVT,DSCR,NIVT: full prop encouraged/invited/discouraged/not invited CAN,DAWD,DEL,ERR,INAP,OCGI,PRTN,WPRE,ZER: uncommon on proposals
4-digit object class. Common possibilities 4101 - Personnel Mobility 4110 - Research Grants 4118 - SBIR Grant 4144 - Equipment Grant 4160 - Conference

There are 14 types possible here NEW,RNEW,ABR: new, renew, or accomplishment-based renewal SUPP,INCR,FRWD: supplement / increment / forward fund TRSF: PI transfer EXT,GEXT,CREX: no cost, grantee, or creativity extension RDCT,CNCL: reduction, cancelation BOA,OTHR: basic ordering agreement, other admin action
Assigned PO 7-letter ibm login id, not the 8-letter lan id. e.g. JSNOEYI
4-digit Small: 7923 Medium: 7924 Large: 7925 Include 7936 or exclude ~7936
e.g.%SMALL% to include title that includes word and ~%SMALL% to exclude prop titles that contain SMALL
